short_summary: Tender for Tents and Pickets for Canadian Military Bases
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at: Department of National Defence 25 CFSD Montreal 6363 Notre Dame St. E. Montreal, Quebec H1N 1V9 Canada Department of National Defence 7 CF Supply Depot 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg. 236 Edmonton, Alberta T5J 4J5 Canada by or before 330 calendar days after contract award Item 1, GSIN: 8340, NSN: 8340-21-897-6881, TENT Part No.: 8790069-1, NCAGE: 35907 Quantity: 25 Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFSD Montreal Item 2, GSIN: 8340, NSN: 8340-21-897-6881, TENT Part No.: 8790069-1, NCAGE: 35907 Quantity: 25 Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton Item 3, GSIN: 8340, NSN: 8340-21-859-3003, PIN,TENT Part No.: D373091, NCAGE: 35907 Quantity: 50 Unit of Issue: PKG of 50 to be delivered to CFSD Montreal Item 4, GSIN: 8340, NSN: 8340-21-859-3003, PIN,TENT Part No.: D373091, NCAGE: 35907 Quantity: 50 Unit of Issue: PKG of 50 to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
### Tent and Pin Procurement Notice
#### Project Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for the procurement of tent and pin components to support its supply chain requirements. The contract entails the delivery of the following items:

* Tent: 25 units, Item No.: 8790069-1, NCAGE: 35907
* Pin: 50 units (PKG of 50), Item No.: D373091, NCAGE: 35907

#### Delivery Locations
The successful bidder must deliver the products to the following locations:

* Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Notre Dame St. E., Montreal, QC, H1N 1V9
* Department of National Defence, 7 CF Supply Depot, 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg. 236, Edmonton, Alberta, T5J 4J5

#### Contact Information
For procurement inquiries, please contact Debbie Moldowan at:
* Phone: (819) 939-0832
* Email: Deborah.Moldowan@forces.gc.ca
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

#### Trade Agreements
The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Response Instructions
To respond to this procurement opportunity, interested bidders must submit either a tender or a request for proposal (RFP) in either English or French. The documents may be obtained from the Canada Buy and Sell website ([www.canadabuys.ca](http://www.canadabuys.ca)).

#### Evaluation Criteria
The selection will be based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder. Equivalent or substitute products must be clearly identified with their respective brand names, models, NCAGE, and part numbers.

#### Important Dates
* Tender closing date: Thursday, August 18, 2023, at 14:00 hours (EDT)

Please note that the procurement has been cancelled due to an amendment, please refer to the latest documents for the complete tender notice and amendment history.

### Notice URL
The tender documents and the notice in their entirety are available on the Canada Buy and Sell website.

### Documents
The documents include:

* Amendment 1 (English): https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5125/w8486-238637-amendment_1-b-eng_0.pdf
* RFP (English): https://can
